mapper.select: select STRLEVELSID from tb_member where STRMEMBERID=#{strMemberId} and INTSTATUS=1

select count(strGoodsId) from tb_goods
iState=1
and strGoodsTypeId=#{strSearchGoodsTypeId}
and iIsHotGoods=1
and iIsNewGoods=1
select (case when count(strLevelsRightsMappingId)=1 then dDiscount else 1 end) from tb_member_levelsRights_mapping where iRightsStatus=0 and strRightsId=#{strGoodsId} and strLevelsId=#{strLevelsId}
select (case when count(strPreferentialId)=1 then iRequiredIntegral else 0 end) from tb_goodspreferential_mapping where strLevelsId=#{strLevelsId} and strGoodsId=#{strGoodsId}

select strGoodsId, strGoodsBarCode, strUnitId, strUnitName, strGoodsName, strGoodsTypeId, strGoodsTypeName, strSupplierName, iRequiredIntegral, dEnterPrice, dSalePrice, iStock, iPreferentialType, iState, iIsNewGoods, iIsHotGoods, txtGoodsDesc, txtGoodsDescDetail, strGoodsImg, strEmployeeId, strEmployeeName, strEmployeeLoginName, strInsertTime, strUpdateTime from tb_goods where iState=1 and strGoodsId=#{strGoodsId}
